definition: course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

pinyin: pu3 lei2 ke4 si1 liu2 cheng2

sentences.english: Build a sub-process that you can use to manage larger business systems.
sentences.chinese: 構建可以用來管理較大業務系統的子流程。

sentences.english: Implementing customer scenarios to include the flow of defect submissions expands integration coverage.
sentences.chinese: 包含缺陷交付流程的實施客戶場景擴展了集成的範圍。

sentences.english: CEG will initiate new supplier qualification process if required.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，專家團將啓動供應商認證流程。

sentences.english: Reevaluate the operation task of the operators and do not cause changes to the process flow.
sentences.chinese: 重新平衡操作工的作業含量，對過程流程不引起更改。

sentences.english: From materials workflow to customer service, it’s been a valuable tool.
sentences.chinese: 從工作流程到客戶服務，它是一個很有意義的工具。

sentences.english: You decide to use a microflow process to scope the unit of work.
sentences.chinese: 您決定使用微流程來界定該工作單元的範圍。

sentences.english: Starting from the map, the business processes of interest are then further detailed.
sentences.chinese: 從此圖開始，將對所關心的業務流程進一步細化。

sentences.english: The storefront will aim to simplify the process, in order to attract publishers.
sentences.chinese: 這個商店將努力使得流程簡化以吸引出版商參與。

sentences.english: BRM---Business Risk Management. It is to evaluate the business risk involved for any change in the process.
sentences.chinese: 針對流程的任何變革可能給業務帶來的風險進行管理。

sentences.english: The process of polyvinyl butyral (PVB)was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了聚乙烯醇縮丁醛生產的工藝流程。

sentences.english: In the past, the flow of vein transfuse belonged to pure technology flow.
sentences.chinese: 過去的靜脈輸液流程是純技術流程。

sentences.english: In the past, the flow of vein transfuse belonged to pure technology flow.
sentences.chinese: 過去的靜脈輸液流程是純技術流程。

sentences.english: This also suitable for the prepress system only allow one calibration curve.
sentences.chinese: 這也適用於那些只支持一條校正曲線的印前流程。

sentences.english: Each process should be agnostic of the processes in the upstream layers.
sentences.chinese: 每個流程應該不知道上游層中的流程。

sentences.english: Each process should be agnostic of the processes in the upstream layers.
sentences.chinese: 每個流程應該不知道上游層中的流程。

sentences.english: Different people specialize in different parts of the process.
sentences.chinese: 不同的人會在流程的不同部分更加擅長。

definition: (zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)/(fig.) a part of an integrated whole: aspect (of a project), element (of a policy), sector (of the economy), stage (of a process), etc
many and complicated/mired in minor details
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
